about_the_game:
Welcome to Bonefield, Montana, where the lines between reality and nightmare blur. This sleepy little Midwest town holds a dark secret, one you're hired to uncover as a private investigator from out of town. What seemed like a straightforward case takes a turn for the horrifying as nightmarish horrors come to light and start relentlessly pursuing you. It will take all your wits, instincts, and determination to survive the dangers of this twisted town and solve the case once and for all. Captured through the immersive lens of a bodycam, every frantic moment is brought to life as unspeakable horrors pursue you at every turn. 

BoneField is a bodycam survival horror where realism and tension are paramount. Find resources to stay alive, and combine them to defend yourself against the horrors of backwoods Montana, with firearms, improvised defenses, and everything else - if you can do it in real life, you can do it in BoneField. Are you ready to tackle the challenge and unravel the horrifying secrets of Bonefield, Montana?

  • Bodycam Terror: Experience the dread and immersion of survival horror through the perspective of a bodycam. Every place visited in BoneField is realized with meticulous attention to detail, extending to gameplay  Every heartbeat, every quickened breath, and every split-second decision is captured in real-time, intensifying the horror and putting you right in the middle of the action.

  • Nightmarish Challenges: The horrors unleashed in sleepy Montana come at you relentlessly. Every moment counts, finding weapons, tools, and strategizing how to best keep them at bay - and yourself alive. Things can change at any moment: From crazed stalkers to grotesque creatures, you’ll need to think fast and act faster. Fight back with whatever you can scavenge, or flee when the odds are too high.

  • Horrifying Realism: No easy stashes or safe rooms here. Every weapon, tool, and resource must be earned, crafted, or found in the environment. If it exists in real life, you can use it to survive in Bonefield—but nothing comes easy.

  • Outsmart, Outlive: Whether it's a horrific medical experiment stalking you or other monstrosities determined to end the investigation in bloodshed, you will need to keep a cool head to survive and use all your wits to make it through.

  • Twisted Reality: To find out the truth, you’ll have to survive through seemingly normal pieces of Americana - a mountain retreat, a high school, a hiking trail in a picturesque forest - with the familiar turned alien by the horrors set loose upon Bonefield county.

  • Dark Mysteries: Everything connects together, but to unravel the secret of Bonefield, you'll have to stay alive long enough to crack the mysteries of each place the trail leads to. Hidden passages, concealed stashes, and dark, long-forgotten places all hold a piece of the puzzle necessary to reveal the secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)

short_description: Bonefield, Montana. You’re a PI hired to look into a whistleblower report, but the horrors lurking in this town are worse than expected. Experience bodycam horror, survive against relentless stalkers, find weapons to keep them back. Survive long enough to complete your investigation - and get out.
